result.html: ar aimsigh tú an áitDid you find the place?

result.eng: Slim chance she will find anything there.

result.eng: How did you find the place?

result.eng: You will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ga: gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair

result.eng: I am unable to find work.
result.ga: níl mé in ann post a fháil

result.eng: I find my being Irish no cause for shame.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
